title: [LiveLogger] Only show indicators for projects where relevant
body:
Fixes #8456

### Context
For each project, details regarding amount of messages, warnings and errors are shown. However, this information must be hidden where it is not relevant.

### Changes Made
Add the <number> ℹ️, <number> ⚠️, <number> ❌ output only when <number> is >0 (for each of the three).

### Testing
Manual testing

### Notes

commit.message: Only show message, warning and error indicators when they exist

nodes.body: Hey @edvilme! We've taken a small reset on LiveLogger while we reevaluate some of the design goals, so we're probably not going to take this right away. When we have a bit more clarity on what we want to do we'll try to be clear about writing it down . . .
The changes in #8619 will supersede this, so I'm going to close it. Soon we'll have daily SDK builds with the new bits to try out.
